search_ch0215_00_lutia/6601_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Lisia were
practicing showing off their appeal in preparation
for the upcoming contest.
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6601_1201_0200_10:
You’ve got the basics down! Now it’s time to test
your skills!
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6601_1201_0300_10:
How about you try appealing to those people
over there?
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6601_1201_0400_10: But first, a word of advice!
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6601_1201_0500_10:
Different people have different tastes! You have to
take a good look at your audience...
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6601_1201_0600_10:
and pick a style that you think will best appeal
to them!
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6601_1201_0700_10:
Maybe something good will happen if you can
put a smile on the faces of the people here!
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6602_1201_0100_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s Appeal Eruption!
Look at all these people cheering for you!
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6602_1201_0200_10:
You kinda remind me of a really amazing person
I met in Hoenn!
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6602_1201_0300_10: Hehehe! Now you’re a real contest idol yourself!
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6603_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was invited to a fan
event with Lisia and her fans.
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6603_1201_0400_10:
Check me out! I’m the most dazzling and dizzying
one here!
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6603_1201_0500_10: H-hey! I can do that, too!
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6603_1201_0700_10:
Look at your enthusiasm! This reminds me of the
Talent Round in a contest!
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6603_1201_0800_10:
Hey, hey! Which of these fans do you think has
what it takes to be the most dazzling, dizzying,
and doldrums defying?
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6603_1201_0900_10:
Let’s pretend to be judges and check out the
appealing performances of all our fans here!
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6604_1201_0100_10:
Thank you all for coming today! I’m so happy you
could be here with me! It was really exciting!
search_ch0215_00_lutia/6604_1201_0200_10:
Let’s take a picture together to end the event!
Show me your best smiles, everyone!
